content:
I've put together then agenda of "all things FHIR-related" happening at the WGM based on published agendas: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Agenda_201709_WGM

A few caveats:
- Agendas sometimes change. If you change an an agenda item that's FHIR related, please update this wiki page (or let me know so I can)
- My assessment of FHIR-related is based on whether the agenda item contained the word "FHIR" or was about a topic or project that I definitely new was FHIR-related. I suspect there are FHIR-related agenda items I might not have recognized and thus missed. If you can double-check the entries for your work group, that'd be great.
The FHIR agenda for the Sydney WGM can now be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+WGM+Agendas+2020-01
As always, if/when things changed or you discover something FHIR-related that was missed, either make the corrections yourself or ping me and I'll update for you
